means: Semi-automated Computer Oriented Text 半自动面向计算机文本

sentence.Network_en: Others who were guilty were being allowed to get off scot-free.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他犯罪人员不予处罚。

sentence.Network_en: They got off scot-free because of lack of evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于证据不足，他们得以逍遥法外。

sentence.Network_en: The 42-year-old Scot has guided the team to victory in three of their last five games.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位42岁的苏格兰人带领球队在最近5场比赛中赢了3场。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 另外,顺便提一个与scot(税赋)相关的短语“pay sb.s scot andlot”,指的是“还清债款;分摊财政负担”。 Up in Annie's room: 鬼才知道… 你一边聚精会神.

scot 帐款, scot 开管, scot 廷代尔
...理解为“不会放过他”或“饶不了他”。不过，顺水推来的词义要不得，“词海拾贝”讲究刨根问底、探寻词源。乍一看，“scotfree”似乎和Scot（苏格兰人）有关——“苏格兰人免于受罚”或者“苏格兰人被免除税款”？这样推似.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English, from Old Norse skot 'a shot', reinforced by Old French escot, of Germanic origin; related to shot

entry.def: A Scot is a person of Scottish origin.
Scots is a dialect of the English language that is spoken in Scotland.

example.ex: There are things you can express in Scots that you can't say in English.
example.tran: 有些话可以用苏格兰英语表达，而无法用标准英语表达。

entry.def: Scots means the same as Scottish .

example.tran: 他那从喉咙发声的苏格兰口音

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Scotland
